document_data.caption: A map showing Hakim Oasis near Tajar.
document_data.name: Hakim Oasis
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hakim Oasis''' was found near the [[Pearl Cities]] region of [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: The oasis was located {{SI|100|mi|k}} southwest of [[Tajar]] along the western edge of [[al-Yabki Mountains]].
document_data.Acitvities: The Hakim Oasis was vital for caravans travelling between [[Gana]] and Tajar traversing the western side of the mountains. Caravans enjoyed the waters of [[al-Sabiya River]] for much of the journey, but the Hakim Oasis provided a much needed respite after al-Sabiya River terminated.
